reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress gorgeous, with good quality material and a perfect fit. They describe it as comfortable, with stretchiness in the upper portion, and appreciate its versatility for beach trips and tropical vacations. The dress receives mixed feedback about its sheerness - while the bottom part is fairly sheer, some find it completely see-through. The material quality also gets mixed reviews, with some praising it while others find it cheaply made. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!!
items.body: WOW! This dress is so gorgeous and perfect for a beach vacation! I love the fabric, the colors are bright and stunning, the fit is flattering. I may need this dress in all the colors! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous, lightweight, figure-flattering, with lots of stretch
items.body: This dress was so figure flattering and comfortable to wear. The material has tons of stretch (think swimsuit) and breathes well in the heat. There is a lot of elastic in the upper portion of the dress and because of the gathering, you can bunch it up and hide the problem areas. It has a drop waist for a down-to-your ankles look or you could lift higher for a shorter dress length. Be aware that the bottom part is fairly sheer though. Im 5â€™4â€ and about 140 lbs with a large bust and the Medium fit perfect. The dress looks and feels elegant and flowy without being too suggestive. I loved wearing it. My husband said is was so pretty ðŸ˜ Read more
items.author: Sunnyblondetxan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and super attractive
items.body: I love this dress. I took it on vacation and it was perfect for the Caribbean. Itâ€™s light weight but not see through. It has a good amount of stretch but hugs the curves and itâ€™s SUPER comfortable! The slit is just right - it doesnâ€™t reveal anything downstairs. I would buy this again . Read more
items.author: Jenny J

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Top Fabric Longer Than Advertised
items.body: I am 5â€™8 130 and usually a S/M. I got the M after the size guide for the waist (Iâ€™m normally a 27-28). I was so excited for this dress! The top part is just too long. Maybe I got it too big? The length is perfect if I had heels. But the picture of the girl has the top fabric sit way more above (which I wanted) than what I received. Itâ€™s not very forgiving on the curves as shown (which Iâ€™m ok with, but some people may not like that). In my last pic, I showed what it should look like with the top fabric sitting higher, but I donâ€™t prefer the ruffles/ruche going on. I also was excited about the asymmetrical slant thing going on, but that barely existed on me. Just wanted to show how long the top part of the fabric is on me, because itâ€™s much higher on the girl and Iâ€™m â€œtallerâ€. Returning. I wish I loved this dress because it is beautiful. Read more
items.author: Tatum J.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars 10/10. Stunning. Trust me!!!
items.body: The media could not be loaded. This dress is STUNNING! Not only is it comfortable, but itâ€™s a nicely made dress for the price. Iâ€™m 5â€™4â€ and 127lbs. Iâ€™m wearing a small. I pulled the dress up and made it gather at the waist. My heels are about 3 or 4 inches and the length was perfect after pulling it up. It looks like something you could buy from Zara or even free people. The top of the dress is double, if not triple layered. I was expecting it to be very thin at the top, but I was impressed with its thickness! The shear â€œbohoâ€ zebra print layer is so pretty. I love that itâ€™s semi see through on the bottom, and the slit is very flattering. I was worried about the top of it staying up because most strapless tops/dresses tend to fall and I always have to pull it up. Didnâ€™t have to with this one! Would be great for bachelorette parties, summer/early fall weddings, date nights and anytime you need a long dress and donâ€™t want to spend $$$. Sorry the picture is blurry! I took a screenshot of a video. Read more

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not for shirt girls!!!
items.body: LOVED the dress. Texture is mesh-like. Not see through. Has elasticity along top seam so it wonâ€™t fall off you. Only 4 stars though because I had to return it. Iâ€™m 120lbs, usually a size S. This was a perfect fit BUT Iâ€™m 5â€™3 and this was extremely long. Put 3â€ heels on and just barely touched the ground still. I would say this dress is perfect for taller girls (5â€™5+) Read more
items.author: keira

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Brown, Purple, Black, Light Yellow, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
